## Bio

Vanessa Laird is a Licensed Psychologist is Saratoga Springs, New York. 
She focuses in Psychological Assessment and Psychotherapy. 
She is a member of the American Psychological Association and frequently 
collaborates with researchers and scientists in to study the 
scientist-practitioner model in counseling psychology programs. 

## Education

**Texas A&M University** | College Station, TX

- Ph.D. in Counseling Psychology | 2011 - 2017
- M.Ed. in Counseling Psychology | 2011 - 2012

**University of Texas at Austin** | Austin, TX

- B.A. in Psychology | 2006 - 2011
